channel.title: Goin 4 99 fletchin... again
channel.description: Well, i no longer can afford cooking because of low money (i got ancients :rolleyes:) so i decided fletching, as i was at it before, and got to 70 in 2 days, 79 in about 4 days (2 lvls a day, playing 3 hours a day), so my cooking is 80, fletching is 79. Problem is, fletching, you have to cut & string to get the normal xp a lobster would give if you were cooking, so its 2x slower.. But im unfamiliar with fletching so, if you have any tips please lemme know, like what to do while im fletching because i get very, very, very, very bored. And what should i fletching from 80-99? yews all the way? or stop and start something else, etc.

item.title: Goin 4 99 fletchin... again
item.dc:creator: @skeebo skeebo
item.description:
@skeebo wrote:

i advise yew longs until mage longs, then mage longs till 99

Read full topic

item.title: Goin 4 99 fletchin... again
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:15, topic:200633”][quote author=Frell link=topic=265266.msg2198815#msg2198815 date=1208632208]

Just found out you lose money doing mage longs and shorts, so im doing yews till the end, maybe a few mage longs along the way buy mostly yews.

Of course you will lose money but it’s almost 2x faster then yews.

Losing money was the whole reason i stopped going for 99 cooking, Ill spend at least 500k on getting mage longs

[/quote]
Well can you tell me your current fletching level if it’s still not 79. Also, how much cash you have?[/quote]
81 fletching, 95k till 82, and about 4.8m

Read full topic

item.title: Goin 4 99 fletchin... again
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:10, topic:200633”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=265266.msg2192760#msg2192760 date=1208416321]

They do sell actually, pures buy them.

Still? for bh? But in mass quantities?
I never would have guessed.

2million players and more…if lets say 450,000 of them are pure rangers thats at least going to sell from him 500-1000 mages…from the other players that do mages…and others might buy 1 or 2 just to have…also…it’s a popular weapon to train range with :D.
[/quote]
very true, i just want to make sure i dont lose money buying the log, and string and selling the bow

What about mage longs?[/quote]

They can be like yews, but when they make profit, BANG and the cost is sorted!

Read full topic

item.title: Goin 4 99 fletchin... again
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Do not do mages at all. Especially if you do mage shorts. Magic logs are 1.2k magic shortbows are 600ea. You lose about 600gp or more per bow. Also magic longs do not sell very well. You are better off sticking with yew longbows all the way to 99. I got 91 on my account before it was banned. I also made about 7m off fletching getting there :P. That was a year and a half ago though so.

Read full topic

@cooper wrote:

Frell:

Well, i no longer can afford cooking because of low money (i got ancients :rolleyes:) so i decided fletching, as i was at it before, and got to 70 in 2 days, 79 in about 4 days (2 lvls a day, playing 3 hours a day), so my cooking is 80, fletching is 79. Problem is, fletching, you have to cut & string to get the normal xp a lobster would give if you were cooking, so its 2x slower… But im unfamiliar with fletching so, if you have any tips please lemme know, like what to do while im fletching because i get very, very, very, very bored. And what should i fletching from 80-99? yews all the way? or stop and start something else, etc.

Yews are fast, and profitable if you high alch.
